title: Hello, I have the first pixel, and for the last month I have problems with its mic.
content:
I have mic issues. can't make calls, receive, etc. can't use google assistant.

I'm not a u.s citizen, and I don't know what I can do. Why a non u.s citizen can't claim the refund from the pixel lawsuit? I bought my pixel with real money like them! 
Many Thanks
Amir
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel
